definition: any of various large keen-sighted diurnal birds of prey noted for their broad wings and strong soaring flight, shoot in two strokes under par
details:
noun
- any of various large keen-sighted diurnal birds of prey noted for their broad wings and strong soaring flight
= synonyms: bird of Jove
- an emblem representing power
= example: an emblem representing power
- a former gold coin in the United States worth 10 dollars
- (golf) a score of two strokes under par on a hole
verb
- shoot in two strokes under par
- shoot two strokes under par
= example: shoot two strokes under par
= synonyms: double birdie
